doc.title: Endal
doc.plot: British naval officer Allen Parton suffered a serious head injury while serving in the Gulf war and returned home unable to walk, or remember his previous life prior to leaving for the Gulf. He had no recollection of his wife, children and family. His wife, Sandra, was a nurse and thought she would be able to help her husband. As time went on she new she was fighting an uphill battle to keep the family together. ENDAL was a Golden Labrador puppy with problems of his own. Until he 'adopted' Allen and Sandra. He was to change their world forever and give them back their lives.
